## What is Openscapes?

<br/>

::: incremental
-   **Openscapes goal:** champion open practices in environmental science to help uncover data-driven solutions faster
-   **Engage:** build awareness and excitement about tools to do better science in less time
-   **Empower:** build confidence and skills by connecting scientists to resources
-   **Amplify:** build champions and communities to encourage information sharing
:::
